assignments.description: Collection of all possible input variables for this flow. Can be used for dev and testing. Should be updated as the flow is updated and/or new subflows are added.
assignments.name: Input_Variables
assignments.label: Input Variables

assignments.description: Sets the boolean flag indicating that the meeting date needs to be updated
assignments.name: Set_Update_Meeting_Date
assignments.label: Set Update Meeting Date

decisions.description: validates that the deputy values have been sent from the process before updating the meeting.
decisions.name: Deputy_Values_sent
decisions.label: Deputy Values sent

decisions.description: Determines if this is the first time the meeting is scheduled
decisions.name: First_time_scheduled
decisions.label: First time scheduled

decisions.description: Sends flow logic in the correct direction for the record Type
decisions.name: Rec_Type
decisions.label: Rec Type

decisions.description: Checks that the status changed before triggering events that require a status change to fire.
decisions.name: Status_Changed
decisions.label: Status or Time Changed

decisions.description: Checks the status and directs the flow logic appropriately
decisions.name: Status_Value
decisions.label: Status Value

decisions.description: Checks the status and directs the flow logic appropriately
decisions.name: Status_Value_0
decisions.label: Status Value

decisions.description: Validates that all input variables to start the flow are populated as expected
decisions.name: Valid_inputs
decisions.label: Valid inputs

decisions.description: Specific steps that need to take place for specific rec types of WCA meetings
decisions.name: WCA_Meeting_Specific_Actions
decisions.label: WCA Meeting Specific Actions

Flow.description: Added BoolsNew to allow saving records as "Scheduled"

formulas.description: formula to replace null with the word NULL for deputy ID or "blank value" if the value is an empty string or the actual value of the field. Used for debugging the logic
formulas.name: flaDepValuNulDebug

formulas.description: Formula to determine if the meeting is new or updated
formulas.name: frmIsNew

Flow.label: Meeting Flow

recordUpdates.description: Updates the meeting record to set the original meeting date.
recordUpdates.name: Set_Original_Meeting_Date
recordUpdates.label: Update Meeting

recordUpdates.description: Updates the meeting record to set the original meeting date.
recordUpdates.name: Set_Original_Meeting_Date_0
recordUpdates.label: Update Meeting

recordUpdates.description: Updates the meeting record to set the original meeting date.
recordUpdates.name: Set_Original_Meeting_Date_0_0
recordUpdates.label: Update Meeting

recordUpdates.description: Updates the meeting record to set the original meeting date.
recordUpdates.name: Set_Original_Meeting_Date_1
recordUpdates.label: Update Meeting

recordUpdates.description: Updates the meeting record to set the original meeting date.
recordUpdates.name: Set_Original_Meeting_Date_2
recordUpdates.label: Update Meeting

recordUpdates.name: Update_deputy_on_Non_New_Records
recordUpdates.label: Update deputy on Non New Records

textTemplates.description: text of all variables input to the flow for debugging error in flow
textTemplates.name: txtDebugText

variables.description: Flag set when it is necessary to update the deputy details
variables.name: boolDeputyUpdateFlag

variables.description: The meeting that triggered the flow that needs to be updated
variables.name: objMeeting

variables.description: Employer on the case
variables.name: varCaseEmployer

variables.description: Parent Case ID of the meeting that triggered the flow
variables.name: varCaseID

variables.description: ID of the deputy assigned to the case
variables.name: varDeputyID

variables.description: Estimated duration calculated in, then passed in, from PB
variables.name: varEstimatedDuration

variables.description: Hearing officer assigned to the meeting.
variables.name: varHearingOfficer

variables.description: BOFE meeting start date
variables.name: varLegacyMeetingDate

variables.description: Date meeting was created. Passed in from Process
variables.name: varMeetingCreatedDate

variables.description: ID of the meeting that triggered the flow
variables.name: varMeetingID

variables.description: Last modified date of meeting passed from process
variables.name: varMeetingLastModifiedDate

variables.description: Record type of the meeing that started the flow
variables.name: varMeetingRecType

variables.description: Start date/time for the meeting passed from the process
variables.name: varMeetingStartDate

variables.description: Status of the meeting that started the flow
variables.name: varMeetingStatus

variables.description: The original meeting date passed from the process or set if this is the first time.
variables.name: varOriginalMeetingDate

variables.description: When a case is related to a registration, pass the registrationID from the PB into this variable
variables.name: varRegistrationID

variables.description: User ID of the senior deputy on the parent case
variables.name: varSeniorDepUserID

variables.description: Boolean flag to indicate if the Start Time changed or not. Used in the meeting scheduling sub flow to determine if actions need to be taken
variables.name: varStartTimeChanged

variables.description: Boolean flag to indicate if the status changed or not. Used in the meeting scheduling sub flow to determine if actions need to be taken
variables.name: varStatusChange

variables.description: Boolean value set by checing if the deputies are set on the case so that they can be updated if needed.
variables.name: varUpdateDeputyValues

variables.description: Boolean value determined by comparing if the original meeting date is set or not and whether the meeting is scheduled
variables.name: varUpdateMeetingDate
